title: Signal ID
description: Structured signal identifier with agent URL and signal name

agent_url.description: URL of the agent that defines this signal (e.g., 'https://liveramp.com' for LiveRamp signals, or 'https://publisher.com/.well-known/adcp/signals' for custom signals)

id.description: Signal identifier within the agent's namespace (e.g., 'cats-that-use-ai', 'luxury_auto_intenders')
